LoR-description: <1>For {{name}}</1><2>Thank you for taking interest in writing a letter of recommendation! The letter must be written, signed and sent by the students teacher, coach or such. Maximum 1 page per letter. The student will not be able to see the letter, but will receive a notification once it is uploaded. The file must be a PDF and the size limit is 5 MB.</2><3>For more information, see here.</3>
